desc: I hand carve jewelry, pendants, charms and small sculpture objects in my home workshop in Vancouver, British Columbia. Most of my designs are wood carvings, bone carvings and mammoth tusk carvings for men and woman. Nature is my greatest inspiration along with influence from the Netsuke Carvers and the Maori Carvers.

layout.text:
jewelry and small sculptural objects
hand-carved from fossil mammoth tusk, bone, exotic hardwoods
accented with sterling silver, gemstones
